p: Cytotoxicity is an undesirable property of immune modulators. To determine the cytotoxicity of compounds 1– 2, and oleanolic acid aglycon, we treated RAW 264.7 cells with serially diluted concentrations of individual molecules for 3 days and examined the numbers of cells in the culture by an MTT assay. The results showed that none of the molecules exerted noticeable cytotoxicity even at 20 μM ( Figure 4).
